title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Sept. 14
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Sept. 14
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Park City Group (PCYG). Park City Group Inc.'s shares are headed for the biggest one-day drop since March after fiscal fourth-quarter results were disappointing. Earnings were lower than the estimates of two analysts in a Bloomberg survey. Both of them began covering Park City within the past month and a half and put buy ratings \u0010on the stock.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
